newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Hollinger started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Hollinger started as buy.

text.p: -- Bear Stearns said on Friday it had started coverage of Hollinger International Inc with a buy recommendation.
-- Details of the recommendation were not immediately available.
-- The company's stock rose 3/8 to 11-3/4 in midmorning exchange trade.
